job_tasks.phrase: innovatieve cloud- en AI-oplossingen te ontwikkelen en implementeren.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core software engineering task of developing and implementing solutions, which in this context are cloud and AI-based.

job_tasks.phrase: generative AI, Terraform, Python, Azure, Large Language Models (LLMs), Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) en AI producten (DSpy) toepast om innovatieve generatieve-ai-oplossingen te ontwikkelen en implementeren.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the application of technologies to develop and implement GenAI solutions, fitting the integration aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: geavanceerde cloud- en AI-oplossingen te ontwerpen, te bouwen en implementeren die de efficiÃ«ntie en effectiviteit van onze netbeheeroperaties verbeteren
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the core software engineering tasks of designing, building, and implementing solutions to improve operational efficiency.

job_tasks.phrase: het verminderen van de druk op schaarste personeelscapaciteit en het bevorderen van de energietransitie.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the business context and strategic goals the role aims to achieve, aligning with understanding business problems and translating them into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: verantwoordelijk voor het bouwen en beheren van innovatieve cloud- en AI-oplossingen die cruciaal zijn voor onze netbeheeroperaties.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the responsibility for building and managing solutions, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Dit omvat het ontwikkelen van op maat gemaakte oplossingen met behulp van tools zoals Terraform, Python, Azure, en LLMs, evenals het beheren en verbeteren van bestaande oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: This details the development of custom solutions using specific tools and the management/improvement of existing ones, all core software engineering activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Je neemt je verantwoordelijkheid in het ontwerpen, bouwen en beheren van jouw oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes ownership and responsibility for the software development lifecycle (design, build, manage).

soft_skills.phrase: boeiende samenwerkingen, zowel binnen als buiten je team
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration within and outside the team.

soft_skills.phrase: Je denkt mee met het team hoe we het beste onze technieken en tools kunnen inzetten.
soft_skills.justification: This indicates collaborative thinking and contribution to team strategy.

profile.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing, implementing, building, and managing cloud and AI solutions using technologies like LLMs and RAG. All described responsibilities fall under traditional software engineering tasks (Macro-Category A), specifically 1.A.1. Software Development & Integration. While GenAI technologies are central to the solutions being built, the role's core activities are about the engineering and integration of these solutions into operational systems, rather than the specialized development or fine-tuning of the AI models themselves. This makes it an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the responsibilities and the technologies involved. The distinction between building/implementing solutions using GenAI and the specialized tasks of model development or prompt engineering is evident. The role clearly falls into the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile based on the provided definitions.
